notices.title: School Reopening Announcement
notices.body: Ghonar Chala High School will reopen for the new academic session on September 1, 2025. All students are requested to attend the orientation program at 8 AM.

notices.title: Annual Sports Day
notices.body: The Annual Sports Day is scheduled for September 15, 2025, at the school ground. Students are encouraged to participate in various events.

notices.title: Admission Test Schedule
notices.body: The admission test for the 2026 academic year will be held on December 10, 2025. Application forms are available at the school office.
